Keyboard shortcuts for YouTube

A visual cheat-sheet for the 18 keyboard shortcuts found on YouTube.com

Original Reference Report Issue

General

Play/Pause when the seek bar is selected, activate a button if a button has focus

  • Space

Play/Pause in player

  • K

Seek backward/forward 5 seconds

  • Left/Right

Seek backward 10 seconds in player

  • J

Seek forward 10 seconds in player

  • L

Seek to the beginning of the video

  • Home

Seek to the last seconds of the video

  • End

Increase volume 5%

  • Up

Decrease volume 5%

  • Down

Seek to the 10-90% of the video

  • 1-9

Seek to the beginning of the video

  • 0

Move between H1 headers

  • Shift
  • 1

Go to search box

  • /

Activate full screen, press again (or Esc) to exit

  • F

Activate closed captions and subtitles, press again to hide

  • C

Move to the next video

  • Shift
  • N

Move to the previous video

  • Shift
  • P

Launch the Miniplayer

  • I

Move forward a single frame (while paused)

  • .

Move back a single frame (while paused)

  • ,
